48.eng-name: The Book Pertaining to the Remembrance of Allah, Supplication, Repentance and Seeking Forgiveness

hadiths.text: {m-89} Bu hadîsi bana Züheyr b. Harb da rivayet etti. (Dedikî): Bize îshâk b. Yûsuf El-Ezrak rivayet etti. (Dediki): Bize Zekeriyya bu isnadla rivayet etti

chapter.ara-name: باب اسْتِحْبَابِ حَمْدِ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى بَعْدَ الأَكْلِ وَالشُّرْبِ
chapter.eng-name: It Is Recommend To Praise Allah After Eating And Drinking
